text: Alyonka () is a 1961 Soviet comedy movie directed by Boris Barnet.Субботние культурные мероприятия в Москве посетили 850 тысяч человекАЛЁНКА (1961) It stars Natalya Ovodova, Irina Zarubina, and Vasiliy Shukshin. == Actors == * Natalya Ovodova as Alyonka Muratova (as Natasha Ovodova) * Irina Zarubina as Vasilisa Petrovna * Vasiliy Shukshin as Stepan Revan (as V. Shukshin) * Nikolay Bogolyubov as Dmitri Prokofitch * Erast Garin as Konstantin Venyaminovich == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Boris Barnet
title: Alyonka
